Name: Redgate - Deploy from Package
Description: Uses Redgate's [SQL Release](http://www.red-gate.com/sqlreleaseproductpage) to deploy a package containing a database schema (created by Redgate's DLM tools) to a SQL Server database, without a review step.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseNuGetDbPackageDownloadStepName
Parameters.Label: Database package step
Parameters.HelpText: Select the step in this project which downloads the database package.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseTargetDatabaseServer
Parameters.Label: Target SQL Server instance
Parameters.HelpText: The fully qualified SQL Server instance name for the target database.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseTargetDatabaseName
Parameters.Label: Target database name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the database to deploy changes to. This must be an existing database.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseTargetUsername
Parameters.Label: Username (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL Server username used to connect to the database. If you leave this field and 'Password' blank, Windows authentication will be used to connect instead, using the account that runs the Tentacle service.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseTargetPassword
Parameters.Label: Password (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: You must enter a password if you entered a username.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseFilterPath
Parameters.Label: Filter path (optional)
Parameters.HelpText:
Specify the location of a SQL Compare filter file (.scpf), which defines objects to include/exclude in the schema comparison. Filter files are generated by SQL Source Control.

For more help see [Using SQL Compare filters in SQL Release](http://documentation.red-gate.com/display/SR1/Using+SQL+Compare+filters+in+SQL+Release).

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseCompareOptions
Parameters.Label: SQL Compare options (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: Enter SQL Compare options to apply when generating the update script. Use a comma-separated list to enter multiple values. For more help see [Using SQL Compare options in SQL Release](http://documentation.red-gate.com/display/SR1/Using+SQL+Compare+options+in+SQL+Release).

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseTransactionIsolationLevel
Parameters.Label: Transaction isolation level (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: Select the transaction isolation level to be used in deployment scripts.

Parameters.Name: SQLReleaseIgnoreStaticData
Parameters.Label: Ignore static data
Parameters.HelpText: Exclude changes to static data when generating the deployment resources.
